tasks.description: Implement the App class and entry point
tasks.instructions: Implement the `App` class with the constructor `App()` to initialize `pi_estimator` and `gui` instances. Implement the `run()` method to start the GUI. In the same file, create the entry point of the application by checking if `__name__ == '__main__'` and then creating an instance of `App` and calling the `run()` method.

needed.PiEstimator.estimate_pi(): Estimate Pi to the desired precision.

needed.PiEstimator.get_method_description(): Get the description of the Pi estimation method.
